pageProduct.name: A2 Nutrition for Mothers 900g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A2 Nutrition for mothers™ is a nutritional milk drink for pre-conception, pregnancy & breastfeeding.

Warnings

Not suitable for infants and young children

Ingredients

a2 Milk™ skim milk (43%), lactose, a2 Milk™ whole milk (19%), inulin, minerals (calcium, magnesium, zinc, iron, iodine), dried fish oil [emulsifier (soy lecithin)], vitamins (choline, vitamin C, vitamin E, niacin, folic acid, vitamin D3 , vitamin B6 , thiamin, riboflavin, vitamin B12). Contains milk, soy, fish

Directions

Add four level scoops of powder to the water and stir or shake until dissolved. Serve immediately. Recommended intake is 2 serves per day.
